title: Client Crash/ Ranked Promos
body: I was in my ranked promos and was 1-1, I just click accept into my final game and the client crashes. When I log back in, I've lost 10 LP and my promos.

replies.body: Are you using any third party applications?  They've been known to cause crashes during champion select, and [queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) during a series can result in a loss.  Take heart, the new season hasn't started yet!  Let me know if you're still having issues and what specifically is happening, I'd be happy to help!

My client crashes about once a day, I use general apps like curse and razer comms but those are just communication apps, I usually never have anything else running. My friends experience the same problem too with the client crashing. I used the hextech repair tool and I got the logs but i'm not sure where to go from there.

The same thing happened to me, and I find it very odd since I played a lot of matches beforehand and as soon as I enter a ranked game,which was my last promos game, it crashed and counted for a loss...
